title: How much data is used in a 1-hour QHD video stream on YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: As per your question I can provide only approximation of data which is used : Generally it range between 150MB to 1.4GB depending on quality on which you are watching the video stream. Below are the approximation of data consumed based on quality : 240 p ~ 150–200 MB360 p ~ 250–300 MB480 p ~ 400–450 MB720 p ~ 800-950 MB1080 p ~ 1.2 -1.5 GB
